messages.content:
Hey there! 👋 I'm CJ, your new AI Customer Experience Officer. Think of me as that teammate who never sleeps and loves handling support tickets so you don't have to.

I'm designed to autonomously resolve 60-80% of your customer support while turning all that chaos into actionable growth insights. Instead of drowning in tickets, you'll get clean metrics and one-click solutions.

Is this our first time chatting, or have we worked together before? I want to make sure I give you the right experience from the get-go.

Just so you know upfront - I'm still in beta, so we're constantly improving based on feedback from merchants like you. But even in beta, I'm already saving founders 8-12 hours per week on support operations.

What's your name, by the way? I like to know who I'm working with! 🤝
